objects.text: • 100% Pure and Natural • Deep Nourishment • Chemical Free
Premium Quality Hair & Skin Care Essential

product_details.name: Parachute 100% Pure Coconut Oil - Premium Quality Hair & Skin Care Essential
product_details.description:
• 100% Pure and Natural Coconut Oil
• Versatile beauty essential for hair and skin care
• No chemicals, preservatives, or additives
• Ideal for hair moisturizing and deep conditioning
• Perfect for traditional oil massage and skin care
• Helps in maintaining healthy scalp and reducing dandruff
• Cold-pressed extraction method preserves natural nutrients
• Multi-purpose oil suitable for cooking and beauty care
• Comes in a convenient blue bottle with easy-pour design
• Trusted brand with legacy of quality coconut oil products

banner_details:
This banner features a bold and clean promotional design focused on a coconut oil product. At the top, the text layer with id "heading" serves as the main brand name in large, uppercase typography. Directly beneath, the "subheading" text emphasizes the product type in equally bold white lettering. A smaller, supporting statement is provided via the "description" text, centered below the main message.

The product image, identified by "product_image," is prominently centered within a circular white frame, bringing attention to the bottle. On the right, the "price" text is nested inside a bordered circle, indicating cost in a modern font. Below, the "tagline" text conveys product benefits in a concise bullet format. The eye-catching green "cta_button" rectangle carries the central call-to-action, enhanced by the "cta" text highlighting the purchase incentive.

Decorative waves and accent marks in the background add dynamism without cluttering the layout, and the overall visual structure is symmetrical and polished.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Blue: #003366
- Mid Blue: #005CB2
- Light Blue Gradient: #0066CC – #004080
- Green Accent: #4CAF50
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image prominently features a bold and eye-catching deep blue (#005BAC) bottle as the primary color, symbolizing purity and freshness. The white text (#FFFFFF) used for "100% Pure Coconut Oil" and logo elements contrasts sharply, ensuring clear readability. The branding includes a vibrant green (#4CAF50) outline surrounding the logo, representing natural ingredients and vitality. A tropical palm tree icon in green connects to the coconut oil theme. The darker blue backdrop within the logo (#002F6C) adds depth, while the consistent use of blue hues maintains visual harmony. These colors blend smoothly while green and white highlights draw attention effectively.
